name: DynamoDB
description: A NoSQL DB offering by AWS

name: Azure Data Explorer
description: Fully-managed big data analytics cloud platform and data-exploration service

name: Apache Pinot/Startree
description: Realtime distributed OLAP datastore, designed to answer OLAP queries with low latency

name: Trino
description: Fast distributed SQL query engine for big data analytics

name: Helm
description: Kubernetes deployment tool for automating creation, packaging, configuration, and deployment of applications and services to Kubernetes clusters

name: Grafana
description: Grafana is a multi-platform open source analytics and interactive visualization web application.

name: Prometheus
description: An open-source monitoring system with a dimensional data model, flexible query language, efficient time series database and modern alerting approach.

name: Presto
description: Presto is an open source distributed SQL query engine for running interactive analytic queries against data sources of all sizes ranging from gigabytes to petabytes

name: Data Mesh
description: An approach to creating a decentralized Data Architecture.

name: Python
description: A programming language

name: Delta Live Tables
description: ETL framework that uses a simple declarative approach for creating reliable data pipelines and fully manages the underlying infrastructure at scale for batch and streaming data.

name: Velox
isNew: Velox is an open source unified execution engine built by Meta and aimed at accelerating data management systems and streamlining their development

name: Streamlit
isNew: Streamlit turns data scripts into shareable web apps in minutes. All in pure Python. No front‑end experience required.

name: Cube.dev
isNew: Cube is an API‑first business intelligence platform for data engineers and application developers to make data accessible and consistent across every application.

name: Materialize
isNew: Materialize is a fast, distributed SQL database built on streaming internals.

name: Redpanda
isNew: Redpanda is a Kafka®-compatible streaming data platform that is up to 10x faster and 6x more hardware-efficient. It is also JVM-free, ZooKeeper®-free, Jepsen-tested and source available.

name: Rudderstack
isNew: Real-time event streaming for customer data. Quickly deploy flexible, powerful customer data pipelines, then send the data to your entire stack—without the engineering headache.

name: Apache Superset/Preset
isNew: Apache Superset is an open-source software cloud-native application for data exploration and data visualization able to handle data at petabyte scale.

name: Fivetran
isNew: Fivetran fully automated connectors sync data from cloud applications, databases, event logs and more into your data warehouse

name: Airbyte
isNew: Airbyte is an open-source data integration engine that helps you consolidate your data in your warehouses

name: StreamSets
isNew: StreamSets offers a platform dedicated to building smart data pipelines to power DataOps across hybrid and multi-cloud architectures.

name: Meltano
isNew: Provider of open-source extract, load and transform pipelines for DataOps. It is a directory with text-based files and features such as tracking of incremental replication rate, data loading into data warehouses, UI for management and monitoring, as well as data extraction from multiple data sources.

name: Plotly
isNew: Plotly is a data science and AI company focused on taking data science out of the lab and into the business. Plotly makes it easy to create, deploy, and share interactive web apps, graphs, and visualizations in any programming language

name: Apache Spark
description: Apache Spark is an open-source unified analytics engine for large-scale data processing.

name: Apache Airflow
isNew: Apache Airflow is an open-source workflow management platform for data engineering pipelines.
